text: N’abakenyezi bahukanye kubanega babo, nibarindire kugeza aho bazo kwisukurira kumihango yabo y’amezi atatu arangiye, kandi ntibarekuriwe kunyegeza imbanyi zabo bafise zaremwe n’Imana ziri munda zabo niba bemera Imana yabo y’ukuri hamwe n’umusi w’imperuka, nabo batambukanyi babo barafise uburenga nzira bw’ukubacura muri ico kiringo niba bagomba kugiriranira imbabazi, nabo bakenyezi barafise uburenga nzira bw’amategeko y’Imana nk’uburenga nzira buri kuribo z’ukubagirira abatambukanyi babo, nabo banega babo barafise iteka ntangere kubasumba, n’Imana niyo nyene ubushobozi n’ubuhizi buhagije
